comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: It seems you have another topic created back in the day? You could edit that topic.Anyway, welcome to the forum.What's the wagering for win from 200 free spins? Also, what's the minimum deposit for being eligible for this bonus?Removed the telegram? Isn't it posted correctly? Feel free to reach out, I'll try to assist fixing that. My telegram- @LT_Mouse

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Another brand new casino on the block, welcome to the forum first of all, and like Little Mouse said, if you have a previous topic or thread, you could edit that or maybe lock it if it's still open for discussion, it is a rule that a service on the forum should not have two active threads, as that can cause confusion.And yeah, 200 free spin is a tempting bonus, and I feel like grabbing that right away, but unfortunately, information on this is not complete, asking the same question Little Mouse asked, what is the minimum deposit required to get this bonus, and what is the amount of wager required to make a withdrawal of wins from this bonus?Casino looks good too, I saw metamask as a registeration option, does the casino offer decentralized betting?

comments.author: cryptocasino.com
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on September 22, 2023, 05:07:09 PMIt seems you have another topic created back in the day? You could edit that topic.Anyway, welcome to the forum.What's the wagering for win from 200 free spins? Also, what's the minimum deposit for being eligible for this bonus?Removed the telegram? Isn't it posted correctly? Feel free to reach out, I'll try to assist fixing that. My telegram- @LT_MouseThanks for the response people. Our old thread is locked, so we've launched a new one with our brand new platform (and the blessing of the mods), branding and amazing bonuses!If you make a first deposit of $100 worth of crypto or more, you receive 200 free spins (20 per day for 10 days). If you make a first deposit less than $100 worth of crypto, you receive 100 free spins (20 per day for 5 days).The free spins have stake of $0.10 per spin. All accumulated winnings resulting from the free spins are paid as a bonus and must be wagered 30 times before the funds can be withdrawn.You can see full dets here https://cryptocasino.com/en/promotions/casino-welcome-bonus/

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Quote from: cryptocasino.com on September 22, 2023, 05:25:09 PMIf you make a first deposit of $100 worth of crypto or more, you receive 200 free spins (20 per day for 10 days). If you make a first deposit less than $100 worth of crypto, you receive 100 free spins (20 per day for 5 days).How about a minimum deposit? Let's say I deposit 0.0005 BTC equivalent to $13 USDT right now will I still get the bonus with 100 spins?BTW... This casino looks different what I see the interface is very elegant different from other casino interfaces,, well I will try to register first.

comments.author: cryptocasino.com
comments.body: Hey AjizYep you will still get the bonus and spins Thanks for the kind words about the look and interface. It's a permanent work in progress as you guys and girls here will appreciate. We welcome all feedback...in particular the stuff that bothers people. We're in this game for teh long haul and want a product that works well and ultimately is fun for the users. We've got big plans for promos going forward. Just need to get the brand and name out there!Have a good weekendCC

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Welcome mate. You have a good UI and graphics to be sincere. I like the fact that the website was well designed and user friendly. But I am curious of this 200 free spins as it is becoming more popular now. Just some days ago some casinos launched with that features and here again another just launched with the same features of 200free spins. I see the competition is very high though but what guarantees your longevity is your relationship with your customers here. Are you ready to communicate with your prospective clients, responding to questions and inquiries about your casino lots more.For publication I will advise you seek the expertise of a reputable manager here to help you organise a promotional campaign for your casino. Otherwise you will have big names here to contend with.

Otherwise you will have big names here to contend with.Hey CryptSafe,Thanks for the kind words. And more important the good advice. You are absolutely right about success and longevity being dependent on the relationship with our customers. We have been (and still are) in the affiliate game for 19 years prior to this, and have had 200k clients for whom we have delivered back $150m+ in cash/promos. We hope that we'll reach that number way faster with this brand We do have a manager I believe who is helping us with our signature program etc.  We're looking forward to hanging out here a lot going forward!Thanks again CC

I think it's too cheap, if it's true.A little ambiguous, you can explain it in more detail here, and tell us, what facilities can be given to VIP members in your casino, because in it there is the phrase "other VIP benefits" what is it?

If you do find any bumps...let us know!Regards the Loyalty Levels - The .12 BTC is the reward rather than what you need to get there!This page might give you a better idea as it breaks down the 31 levels in more detail.https://cryptocasino.com/en/loyalty-rewardsThe VIP Benefits will include, among other things, gifts, parties, trips etc!Hope that helps!CCThank you for the explanation, it is understood and replied to me quickly, thank you for that.Regarding this cashback it is written that we can claim it every day, can it be said as a daily bonus, or a different event?When talking about a bonus, will I get a weekly and monthly bonus as offered by other casinos here, regardless of the degraded event both mungguan and monthly.I suggest that if you want to get more exposure in your forum, you need a campaign manager to promote your project sir, it will be much better. comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: khiholangkang on September 22, 2023, 07:50:38 PMThank you for the explanation, it is understood and replied to me quickly, thank you for that.Regarding this cashback it is written that we can claim it every day, can it be said as a daily bonus, or a different event?When talking about a bonus, will I get a weekly and monthly bonus as offered by other casinos here, regardless of the degraded event both mungguan and monthly.If I'm to read and understand it correctly, the cash back is for those who have wagered on the casino and made some losses, and for every game that they played and lost, they have the chance of claiming the cash back of up to 15%. Let me say, for instance, that if you wager up to $1,000 on the casino and you lose all on the game that you wager, you have the chance to claim back 5–15% of that total spent amount. If it's 5%, it will be $50, and if it's 15%, it will be $150. It all depends on their T&C applied to the wager cash back. And this cash back can be claimed every day after you have played the game.

comments.author: cryptocasino.com
comments.body: Quote from: khiholangkang on September 22, 2023, 07:50:38 PMThank you for the explanation, it is understood and replied to me quickly, thank you for that.Regarding this cashback it is written that we can claim it every day, can it be said as a daily bonus, or a different event?When talking about a bonus, will I get a weekly and monthly bonus as offered by other casinos here, regardless of the degraded event both mungguan and monthly.I suggest that if you want to get more exposure in your forum, you need a campaign manager to promote your project sir, it will be much better. Keep in mind that today there are so many new projects that joined the forum, it seems that you will have intense competition with them.Hi KThe cashback is released as cash and is not a bonus, meaning it has no wagering requirements. Regard bonuses, it's early days for us. But we are already discussing 2nd and 3rd deposit bonuses. But we are confident that if you compare our rewards to other sites, nobody has as much fixed stuff as us. We have Spins, 5-15% cashback, Bonus and $10,000 in loyalty rewards for every player!Regards the manager - i believe our marketing manager has that all sorted out. Have a good weekend!CC

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: cryptocasino.com on September 22, 2023, 05:25:09 PMIf you make a first deposit of $100 worth of crypto or more, you receive 200 free spins (20 per day for 10 days). If you make a first deposit less than $100 worth of crypto, you receive 100 free spins (20 per day for 5 days).The free spins have stake of $0.10 per spin. All accumulated winnings resulting from the free spins are paid as a bonus and must be wagered 30 times before the funds can be withdrawn.200 free spin on deposits of $100 and above is quite a tempting bonuse for most people but only those who take further read will discover that the winning from that free spin os paid out as a bonus and most be wagered 30x which look and sound almost impossible to win any thing and being able to finally withdraw any balance along the line. Also I will like to ask ops,  if the free spin is the only bonus available on the casinos and if no,  what are the other bonuses that await players and what conditions will they be subjected to to meet those bonus demands?

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Hello @cryptocasino.com welcome to the forum, as I can see you have made a great announcement thread here are you are also actively replying and engaging on comments which is a good start showing how active and interested you are to address issues and question that the community have. You casino has a good design that is attractive to the eye, that’s by the way, I believe you are new here and you don’t know how things move around here, but in my eyes it appears as if you are spamming your own thread posting three different comment on a role appears like scamming to me, I have reported them to moderators to merge together, you can try and do the quoting together next time, in other to enable you keep the thread as tidy as possible.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: Welcome! Not exploring the site first but here are some of my basic questions;Click the “Deposit” button below. Enter an amount, currency and payment method. You’ll get 200 Free Spins if your first deposit is $100 or more. Otherwise, you’ll get 100 Free Spins. Users need to have a $100 first deposit to be eligible for 200 Free spins. Is that applied to all slot games and how much is the bet amount here?What's the amount referring to "otherwise"? Does it mean, 100 free spins will be credited even for a minimum deposit amount?

comments.author: goinmerry
comments.body: Unfortunately, the free spins are not available in my country. Why is that? hehe. Not just used to seeing my country not being supported on that promotion as far as most sites are concerned. Generally, users here are supported across most gambling sites globally, especially in promotions. Anyway, I do hope that the minimum withdrawal is somehow user-friendly. In crypto-gambling sites, it's hard to meet minimum withdrawals around BTC0.001. If more than that, it's a long goal. Can we also change the shown currency while playing? A value in fiat shown per bet is my preferred when playing.Welcome to the forum as well.
